subject: Loan for a low month payment
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this lot will expire TODAY):
$333,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://bgyrqybox.com/
